data.name: bbc world service
data.desc: international news, analysis and information from the bbc world service. in-depth news and sport with audio, video and forums.

data.name: jazz fm
data.desc: jazz, soul, blues and rhythm and blues for the north west and london

data.name: classic fm
data.desc: listen live to classic fm online radio. discover classical music and find out more about the best classical composers, musicians and their works.

data.name: new york radio
data.desc: new york radio stations

data.name: ancient music
data.desc: listeners wishing for a break from the modern world – with all its bleeps, blips and pushy commercials – should head over to this rather charming little radio station, which plays music from the medieval and renaissance periods and nothing else.

data.name: hotmix dance
data.desc: hotmixradio dance, écouter la radio gratuite, webradio, écouter musique house techno electro djs agenda photos clubbing clips vidéos actus biographies,

data.name: 70s disco night
data.desc: this wonderfully old-school internet radio station, complete with spinning mirror–ball animation, is a great way to capture the essence of disco. expect irresistibly catchy tunes, ridiculously upbeat lyrics and a faint sense of nostalgia for the era of flares and wide-collared shirts.

data.name: old time radio
data.desc: some time ago, i recommended the antioch otr station (radio.macinmind.com) as a fine source of soothing american radio programmes from the golden era of the 1920s-50s. this site goes one better by allowing users to listen to the shows on demand, with a generous archive.

data.name: rfi anglais
data.desc: suivez toute l"information politique, culturelle, sportive en direct et en continu sur rfi

data.name: rfi 24h en france
data.desc: écouter la session 27min, lundi à vendredi

data.name: rfi dernier journal monde
data.desc: suivez toute l"information politique, culturelle, sportive en direct et en continu sur rfi

data.name: rfi direct monde
data.desc: suivez toute l"information politique, culturelle, sportive en direct et en continu sur rfi

data.name: rfi musique
data.desc: toute l"actualité musicale. concert, biographies, news et sélection d"artistes francophones, africains et toute la world music avec rfi musique

data.name: rfi dernier journal en francais facile
data.desc: suivez toute l"information politique, culturelle, sportive en direct et en continu sur rfi

data.name: france musique
data.desc: the fm spectrum in france is a land of extreme contrasts, offering everything from the very worst in euro-pop to some of the classiest stations on the continent. france musique, the jazz and classical arm of radio france, is a particularly suave member of this latter camp. i’ve yet to hear a dud programme

data.name: the classical station
data.desc: wcpe, the classical station, plays great classical music 24 hours a day on 89.7 fm in north carolina

data.name: piano solo
data.desc: in spite of its cringeworthy name, this station is actually rather a classy operation, which provides an online outlet for the works of over two hundred talented but unsigned solo piano composers. the music tends towards meditative, classical-style compositions (think ludovico einaudi and george winston in terms of tone), and makes for a gentle alternative to classic fm.

data.name: restro soul
data.desc: craig charles’s show on 6 music proves there’s a big appetite for old-fashioned funk and soul radio in the uk – and this great station from london is evidently capitalising on it. featuring everyone from the staple singers to chic to skull snaps to luther vandross, its playlist is an almost guaranteed mood-improver

data.name: kuvo jazz
data.desc: based in denver, colorado, its artfully-curated playlists mostly focus on jazz – broadcasting everything from ella fitzgerald through to madeleine peyroux. a class act.

data.name: glt news
data.desc: broadcasting from studios on the grounds of illinois state university in the wonderfully-named town of normal, wglt is a creative independent radio station with a wide range of programming – from spoken word shows like radiolab and this american life to some excellent in-house blues and jazz.

data.name: npr hourly news
data.desc: npr delivers breaking national and world news. also top stories from business, politics, health, science, technology, music, arts and culture

data.name: glt jazz radio
data.desc: broadcasting from studios on the grounds of illinois state university in the wonderfully-named town of normal, wglt is a creative independent radio station with a wide range of programming – from spoken word shows like radiolab and this american life to some excellent in-house blues and jazz.

data.name: glt acousticity
data.desc: broadcasting from studios on the grounds of illinois state university in the wonderfully-named town of normal, wglt is a creative independent radio station with a wide range of programming – from spoken word shows like radiolab and this american life to some excellent in-house blues and jazz.

data.name: kexp
data.desc: seattle has long been a key musical centre in the us – the birthplace of grunge music, home to nirvana and pearl jam and more recently, fleet foxes. no surprise, then, that the city is also home to a world-class indie and alt-rock radio station. think xfm, but about a hundred times cooler

data.name: reach on air
data.desc: this station gives aspiring broadcasters the chance to put their own content out to a global audience for free. would–be djs simply need to record their show, book a time–slot and upload it to the site. much of the content is shaky, but it"s heartening to hear people giving the medium a shot

data.name: dfm rtv int
data.desc: based in central amsterdam, this radio station broadcasts an eclectic mixture of music, talk and "found sound". i tuned in the other day to hear the audio from an episode of adam curtis’s bbc two documentary series all watched over by machines of loving grace interspersed with britpop era hits. oddly captivating

data.name: wruv fm
data.desc: this community-run station from the university of vermont is a regular springer of surprises, thanks to its 'free form' policy. in a nutshell, djs are given a weekly slot to play whatever they like. this can be a recipe for disaster in the wrong hands, but here it leads to an energising blend

data.name: wfmu
data.desc: possibly the world"s coolest radio station, wfmu is the longest running independent 'freeform' station in the us, operating out of mount hope in new jersey, paid for by its listeners (no ads!), with an eclectic slate of shows that offers something for anyone who has ever ventured outside the mainstream, from the french pop (and birdsong) inflections of this is the modern world with trouble to the early gospel of sinner"s crossroads.
